parameters.responseBody:
={
  "status": "{{$json.onboarding_status}}",
  "message": "{{$json.onboarding_status === 'verified' ? 'Client successfully onboarded and verified!' : 'Client submitted for manual review.'}}",
  "client_name": "{{$json.client_name}}",
  "workflow_id": "{{$json.workflow_id}}",
  "all_validations_passed": {{$json.all_validations_passed}},
  "timestamp": "{{$json.verification_timestamp}}"
}
